section_title: CLIVAR/PAGES/IPCC WORKSHOP ON A 'MULTI-MILLENNIA PERSPECTIVE ON DROUGHT AND IMPLICATIONS FOR THE FUTURE'
sentences: This workshop was held from 18-21 November 2003, in Tucson, US, to discuss new ideas, observations, analyses and theories about drought, and to highlight ways of improving understanding, analysis approaches and predictive capabilities.
The focus of discussions was on North America and Northern Africa using drought-related paleoclimatic data and research.
